name: BirdHalla Remastered
description:
The game has been finished. That's pretty crazy.
Anyways, here's a changelog of some sorts:

General gameplay:

- Bullet reload time has been decreased from 4 seconds to 2 making for more fast-paced gameplay.
- The bullets now have less horizontal force and more vertical force.
- Both the gravity and the jump force have been increased.

Dodge roll:

- The dodge window has been decreased to 0.4 seconds from 0.5
- The cooldown for the dodge has been decreased to 1.5 seconds from 2

Wall:

- The time it takes to place the wall has been decreased to 2 seconds from 3
- The height of the wall has been slightly increased

Other important changes:

- Music and sound effects have both been added
- You can change the master volume of the game
- Usernames and volume are now saved
- There is a quit game button
- The unity splash screen has been spiced up a bit
- The post game menu has recieved some visual improvements
